articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Test-fire of Hwasong-10
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Test-fire of SSM Hwasong-10
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, guided the test-fire of surface-to-surface medium long-range strategic ballistic missile Hwasong-10.
					 At a watch post he gave an order to conduct the missile test-fire after hearing a report on its plan.
					
					 The test-fire of Hwasong-10 was carried out by the high-angle fire system under the simulation of its maximum range.
					
					 The ballistic missile took off a self-propelled launching ramp and accurately landed in the targeted waters forward 400km after flying to the maximum height of 1 413. 6km along the planned flight orbit.
					
					 The test-fire confirmed the flying kinetic feature of Korean-style ballistic missile with an updated system and its safety and control as well as the technical specifications of newly-designed rocket structure and its dynamic system. It also verified the heat-resistance capability of warhead in the re-entry section and its flight stability.
					
					 It provided a sure sci-tech guarantee for developing the system of strategic weapons.
					
					 The test-fire was successfully conducted without giving any slightest effect to the security of surrounding countries.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the test results, he said with joy that this happy news would give the conviction in sure victory and optimism to the army and people of the DPRK and that it is a great event as it strikingly demonstrated again the invincible might of Juche Korea.
					
					 Not only the enemy but also the whole world may properly assess the capability of the DPRK's medium long-range strategic ballistic missile only with its flight track, he said, declaring with conviction: We have the sure capability to attack in an overall and practical way the Americans in the Pacific operation theatre.
					
					 To reliably defend the security of the country and its people from the constant threats of the U.S and other hostile forces, we should have the powerful offensive means able to pose a constant threat to the enemy, he said, adding: It is needed to increase in a sustained way our preemptive nuclear attack capability and continue the study and development of diverse strategic attack weapons.
					
					 The real foe our nuclear force has to confront is a nuclear war itself, he said, stressing that the nuclear attack capability should be steadily bolstered up to protect the country and its people and the Korean revolution from the U.S. imperialists' nuclear threat.
					
					 The current test-fire marked an important occasion in further strengthening the nuclear attack capacity of our state, he said, stressing the need to more thorougly establish the unitary leadership and management system over the strategic nuclear force.
					
					 In congratulation of the successful test-fire of surface to surface medium long-range strategic ballistic missile Hwasong-10, he had a photo session with the defence science soldiers involved in the test-fire.

articles.title: Greetings to Grand Duce of Luxembourg
articles.content:
Greetings to Grand Duce of Luxembourg
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Henri, grand duce of Luxembourg, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message sincerely wished the people of Luxembourg development and well-being.

articles.title: FM Spokesman Assails U.S. for Instigating UN Secretary General to Send Letter to UNSC President
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Assails U.S. for Instigating UN Secretary General to Send Letter to UNSC President
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Thursday in connection with the fact that the U.S. let the UN secretary general forward a letter denying the DPRK's right to launch satellite to the president of the UN Security Council:
					 The DPRK officially registered earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 at UN after going through legitimate procedures under "The Convention on Registration of Objects Launched into Outer Space".
					
					 This is the world's acknowledgment of Kwangmyongsong-4 as a treasure conducive to prosperity common to humankind.
					
					 But the UN secretary general on June 15 sent an incoherent letter to the president of the UN Security Council in which he said that the registration of Kwangmyongsong-4 was just a technical procedure pursuant to the convention and that he conveyed to the UNSC the understanding that he does not consider the launch as a thing legal and valid even though he registered the projectile the DPRK launched into space on Feb. 7, 2016 and informed the UN member nations of the launch in line with the above-said convention. This was something abnormal.
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. which invented and orchestrated such absurd farce that contradicts the function of the UN secretary general and lacked impartiality and independence of the UN activities.
					
					 It is the main purpose sought by the U.S. to strangle a sovereign state at any cost even by cooking up UN Security Council "resolution on sanctions" and by employing all illegal and brigandish means and methods while finding fault with the right to self-defense and legitimate rights of the sovereign state recognized by international law.
					
					 Recently the U.S. introduced all kinds of strategic assets to the Korean peninsula and areas around it, pushing the instable situation on the peninsula to an extreme phase and is getting all the more frantic in its racket for ratcheting up sanctions and pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 The situation clearly proves once again the justice of the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 We are ready for both dialogue and physical measures and have in place everything necessary.
					
					 The U.S. has to face up to the strategic position of the DPRK and the trend of the times and make a bold decision to roll back its anachronistic and hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 As long as the U.S. persists in its hostile policy toward the DPRK, the latter will further bolster its nuclear deterrence for self-defence in quality and quantity and will continue to exercise its legitimate right to develop space for peaceful purposes no matter what others may say.

articles.title: Secretariat of CPRK Blasts Park Geun Hye Group for Trying to Bring Second Kwangju Incident
articles.content:
Secretariat of CPRK Blasts Park Geun Hye Group for Trying to Bring Second Kwangju Incident
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of south Korea tried to stage a "street march in Kwangju Metropolitan City to mark the anniversary of the June 25 war" by hurling the puppet 11th airlift special warfare brigade which brutally massacred uprisers and citizens of Kwangju under the backstage manipulation of the U.S. imperialists and at the instructions of the Chun Doo-Hwan military fascist junta during the Kwangju Popular Uprising in May, 1980.
					 The attempt only caused strong protest and denunciation by the south Korean public.
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in its information bulletin No. 1106 on Thursday said this is an intolerable insult to the participants in the Kwangju Popular Uprising and the Kwangju citizens, an outright challenge to the south Korean people aspiring after independence, democracy and reunification and an unpardonable politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 The bulletin went on:
					
					 The Park's attempt to let the group of murderers who turned Kwangju into "bathhouse of blood" stage a "street march" is a clear manifestation of the criminal attempt of the group of traitors to prolong their remaining days with fascist tyranny and confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 It would be impossible to check the second Kwangju incident nor can the nation be rid of disaster as long as Park is left intact as she inherited only the gene of the "yusin" dictator, being utterly unaware of how the world goes around.
					
					 The south Koreans and all other members of the Korean nation aspiring after independence, democracy and reunification should never tolerate the wild act of the Park group making last-ditch efforts with fascist frenzy but resolutely check it with the nationwide struggle.

articles.title: Members of Military Attaches Corps Visit Sinchon Museum
articles.content:
Members of Military Attaches Corps Visit Sinchon Museum
 Sinchon, June 23 (KCNA) -- Members of the military attaches corps in the DPRK visited the Sinchon Museum Thursday in the run-up to June 25, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism. 
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the tomb of 400 mothers and the tomb of 102 children and observed a moment's silence.
					
					 They looked round various rooms of the museum, powder magazine and former air-raid shelter of the Sinchon County Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea which bear witness to the barbarous and cruel massacre of innocent people committed by the U.S. imperialist aggressors in Sinchon County during the temporary strategic retreat of the Korean People's Army during the past Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Korean Students in Japan Visit Sinchon Museum
articles.content:
Korean Students in Japan Visit Sinchon Museum
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The members of the home-visiting group of students of the Korean high schools in Japan, who visited the Sinchon Museum that lays bare the aggressive nature and brutality of the U.S. imperialists, vehemently denounced their thrice-cursed massacre of Koreans.
					 Jo Thae Il, a member of the group, noted that the museum serves as a historical witness to the hideous crimes committed by American brutes, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces detained 400 innocent mothers and their 102 children separately and burnt them to death by throwing hand grenades and gasoline. It is, indeed, shuddering to see details of the crime.
					
					 I feel as if I were hearing the bitterest lamentation on that day from even a single tree and blade of grass in the land of Sinchon.
					
					 Saying details of the heinous crimes baffling human imagination and lethal tools used by the U.S. imperialists betray their brutality and cruelty, Hwang Sun Sil, another member of the group, noted:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are, indeed, murderers and human butchers.
					
					 The crimes Yankees committed by killing Koreans irrespective of sex and age by middle-age methods are always remembered by all Koreans.
					
					 Kim Yong Ung, the head of the group, said the land of Sinchon helps everyone bear in mind the bitter lesson that if one has even an iota of illusion about the U.S. imperialists, one is bound to meet death.
					
					 To put an end to the national division and build a prospering reunified power on Korea it is necessary to force the U.S. imperialist murderers, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, out of south Korea, he declared.

articles.title: Successful Test-fire of Hwasong-10 Pleases DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Successful Test-fire of Hwasong-10 Pleases DPRK Citizens
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- All the people in the DPRK are delighted at the news of its successful test-fire of surface-to-surface medium long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10.
					 The happy news has given the conviction in sure victory and optimism to the servicepersons and civilians throughout the country.
					
					 Dr. Ri Jong Chol, section chief of the Socio-politics Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					 I'd love to offer my warm congratulations to the defence scientists and technicians for having provided a sure sci-tech guarantee for developing the system of strategic weapons through the test-fire.
					
					 The test-fire displayed once again the strength of Juche Korea and this shows part of Songun Korea's steadily-growing preemptive nuclear attack capability.
					
					 The whole world may feel the DPRK's tremendous might through the flight track of ballistic rocket Hwasong-10.
					
					 The U.S. should reconsider its futile policy of hostility toward the DPRK with this historic event as an occasion.
					
					 Jo Hong Gun, a general officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					 The test-fire confirmed the DPRK's actual capability to attack in an all-round way the Americans in the Pacific operation theatre with strategic ballistic rockets from self-propelled launching pads.
					
					 It is perhaps a deadly blow to the U.S. and its followers posing constant threats to the DPRK.
					
					 The successful launch goes to clearly prove that the heroic KPA is the most powerful armed forces defending with deterrent the country and the people from the U.S. nuclear threats as well as safeguarding the regional and global peace.

articles.title: Demonstration of Invincible Might, Successful Rocket Test-fire
articles.content:
Demonstration of Invincible Might, Successful Rocket Test-fire
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- People of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are seized with great joy at the successful test-fire of new strategic weapon.
					 Kim Chol Ho, a workshop head of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, told KCNA:
					
					 I feel stirring upon receiving the news about the successful test-fire of surface-to-surface medium long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10. It makes me feel high pride as a citizen of Songun Korea with powerful military muscle.
					
					 Though the U.S. and other hostile forces dare provoke the DPRK, we feel encouraging for having such powerful military strength.
					
					 I extend heartfelt congratulations to defence scientists and technicians for the successful test-fire. We, workers, will strive to make greater achievements in the on-going 200-day campaign.
					
					 Ri Hyok Chol, a work-team leader of the Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City, said:
					
					 Thanks to the self-defensive nuclear deterrent, we feel happy and optimistic.
					
					 We, farmers, will surely bring a bumper harvest this year in the spirit displayed by defence scientists and technicians.
					
					 Choe Song Ryong, a brigade commander of the High-Speed Youth Shock Brigade, said:
					
					 I feel extremely exciting upon receiving the news about the successful test-fire.
					
					 With the successful launch as an occasion, the U.S. and the other hostile forces should keenly be aware of that it is impossible for them to hinder Songun Korea in advancing towards a socialist thriving nation.
					
					 Regarding the construction site of Ryomyong Street as a battlefield against the U.S. and other hostile forces, all members of the shock brigade will demonstrate the might of the DPRK all over the world by completing Ryomyong Street at an early date.

articles.title: Korean People Vow to Take Revenge upon U.S. Imperialist Aggressors
articles.content:
Korean People Vow to Take Revenge upon U.S. Imperialist Aggressors
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held by working people's organizations on Thursday to vow to take revenge upon the U.S. aggressors with the approach of June 25, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism. 
					 Present at the meetings held at the plazas of the Sinchon Museum and the Susan-ri House of Class Education were officials of the youth league, the union of agricultural workers and the women's union and officials concerned, youth and students and members of the unions.
					
					 The speakers recalled that the U.S. aggressors massacred more than 35 380 innocent persons in Sinchon County or a quarter of its population in the most barbarous manner during the period of the temporary strategic retreat of the Korean People's Army (KPA) during the Korean war, adding that the U.S. imperialists are cruel man-killers and brutes. 
					
					 The Korean people can never pardon those aggressors who killed innocent people and patriots in such a cruel manner which made even brutes blush, they noted.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists, being oblivious of the lesson taught by history, impose another war upon the Korean people, they will turn out in the battle for defending the country alongside the KPA and sweep the enemies off the surface of the earth and give vent to the pent-up grudge of the nation, they declared.
					
					 Oath-taking poems were recited. 
					
					 The participants chanted the slogans reflecting the firm will to devotedly defend the party and the leader and force the enemies to pay a thousand-fold price for the blood shed by the Korean people.

articles.title: Anniversary of West Sea Barrage Office Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of West Sea Barrage Office Marked
Nampho, June 23 (KCNA) -- The West Sea Barrage Office marked the 30th anniversary of its founding.
					The barrage is a great monumental edifice in the world and an eternal treasure of the country which makes a big contribution to the development of national economy and the protection of land and environment. 
					
					President Kim Il Sung declared to the world the operation of the barrage on June 24, Juche 75 (1986) and gave field guidance to it several times, giving instructions to be implemented to operate the barrage.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il led with deep care the barrage so that it may stand as an eternal monumental structure. 
					
					Over the past three decades, the office has waged a drive to glorify the leadership feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and made its history shine with loyalty. 
					
					A meeting was held on Thursday to observe the day.
					
					Present there were O Su Yong, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Kang Jong Gwan, minister of Land and Maritime Transport, Kang Yang Mo, chairman of the Nampho City Committee of the WPK, officials concerned and officials and employees of the office. 
					
					A report was followed by speeches.

articles.title: Construction of University Buildings in Progress
articles.content:
Construction of University Buildings in Progress
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Construction of new buildings of Kim Il Sung University is progressing apace in Pyongyang, the DPRK as part of the construction of Ryomyong Street.
					 Plastering is now under way at the block No. 3 of building No.3 after the completion of its frame work. And the carcass work of building No. 4 is going on in quick tempo.
					
					 Advanced methods of construction have been applied to those projects.

articles.title: Diverse Art Activities Gain Momentum in DPRK
articles.content:
Diverse Art Activities Gain Momentum in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Artistic activities has been encouraged in the DPRK as part of the efforts to inspire all servicepersons and people to implement the decision made at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Dramatists, novelists and poets of the Central Committee of the Korean Writers Union strive to produce works of various themes calling for implementing the idea and intention of the Party.
					
					 The Mansudae Art Studio created 10-odd pieces of posters calling for the implementation of the tasks set forth at the 7th WPK Congress.
					
					 Artistes of the Mansudae Art Troupe, the Phibada Opera Troupe, the National Folk Art Troupe, the National Circus and other art troupes have carried on agitation activities in different farms and construction sites across the country. And the same is true of movie persons.

articles.title: Roses in Full Bloom at Central Botanical Garden
articles.content:
Roses in Full Bloom at Central Botanical Garden
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Central Botanical Garden in Pyongyang, the DPRK is crowded with visitors these days to see roses in full bloom at a lot for gift plants and rosarium.
					 Among them are bridal pairs and schoolchildren.
					
					 Growing at the lot are a number of varieties presented to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il by the Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan) and foreign countries and at the rosarium those under cultivation in the country.

articles.title: Palaces for Children Representing Love for Younger Generations
articles.content:
Palaces for Children Representing Love for Younger Generations
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Baby homes and orphanages were built in the DPRK one after another thanks to the love of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) for younger generations and future.
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, visited the Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage in February Juche 103 (2014) and took a measure to build new baby homes and orphanages not only in Pyongyang but also in every provincial seat and municipality.
					
					 Thanks to such loving care, baby homes and orphanages have made their appearances in Wonsan, Hamhung, Sinuiju and other parts of the country.
					
					 They have education rooms, libraries, rooms for observing nature, rooms for playing with intelligence toys, amusement rooms, wading pools, bathrooms, barbershops and infirmaries.
					
					 There has been established in the DPRK a regular system to supply those baby homes and orphanages with necessary materials like foodstuffs, fruit, school things and toys.
					
					 When visiting the Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage, a foreign ambassador made an entry in the visitor's book that the baby home and orphanage built under the wise leadership of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un are, indeed, the best in the world and only socialist society can take good care of orphans.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Plan to Stage Large-scale Field Maneuvers
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Plan to Stage Large-scale Field Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet military warmongers are planning to stage large-scale field maneuvers in the area of Kangwon Province of south Korea for two days from June 24, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 It was reported that to be involved in the saber-rattling due with June 25 as a momentum are all units of the puppet army in the province. They will stage drills for aggression including live shell and bullet firing of artillery pieces and individual firing weapons.

articles.title: Teachers Go on All-night Strike in South Korea
articles.content:
Teachers Go on All-night Strike in South Korea
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea went on an all-night strike before the "National Assembly" in demand of a basic right to labor and proper educational conditions on June 20, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye.
					 Before the start of strike the union held a press conference.
					
					 The speakers accused the regime of seeking to control the thoughts of the pupils with "state-compiled history textbooks", sow the seeds of discord among the teaching staff by introducing the system of paying salaries according to piece rate and block the right education through the suppression of the union.
					
					 A press release was read out.
					
					 In the press release they declared they would get the above-said salary system abolished and acquire the basic right to labor through a united action. 
					
					 At the end of the conference they kicked off the strike.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Conduct Crafty Exam for Inciting Dominium over Tok Islets
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Conduct Crafty Exam for Inciting Dominium over Tok Islets
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Recently a question aimed at instilling "dominium over Tok Islets" was included in the exam of pupils of primary schools for entrance to secondary schools in Japan, causing a furor.
					 The south Korean newspaper Dong-A Ilbo disclosed this fact on June. 20, quoting Kyodo News.
					
					 According to it, the question called for pointing "which country illegally occupied Takeshima (Tok Islets)", a crafty artifice to convince the pupils that the Korean nation is the occupier of the islets and Tok Islets are part of Japan's territory occupied by the Koreans.

articles.title: Action of Advancing to U.S. Embassy in Seoul Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action of Advancing to U.S. Embassy in Seoul Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Members of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy in south Korea staged an action of advancing to the U.S. embassy in Seoul on June 20.
					 Holding the placard "U.S. forces, leave with anthrax germ!" they staged a stubborn action outside the U.S. embassy while shouting slogans "Sign peace agreement between north Korea and the U.S.!" "Park Geun Hye Regime, resign as it tramples down human rights and disturbs democracy!" and "Stop to suppression of Korea Solidarity!" and distributing copies of literature.
					
					 They said the U.S. is to blame for the division of the nation and the danger of war.
					
					 The U.S. has introduced even Zika virus in the wake of anthrax germ into south Korea to test them, they said, adding that no elementary human rights and democracy can be expected as long as this land is under the occupation of GIs.
					
					 The suppression of those struggling for peace and reunification and human rights abuses have become more pronounced since Park Geun Hye took power, they charged.
					
					 That day the riot police took away the members of the Korea Solidarity.
					
					 At present they are staging strong protest with silence and hunger strike in demand of the provision of the freedom of expression and their immediate release.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to Seventh Congress of WPK on Central Committee Posted by British Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to Seventh Congress of WPK on Central Committee Posted by British Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- "3. For the Independent Reunification of the Country" of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on the work of the Central Committee was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on June 17 on the occasions of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., WPK and the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed in Mexico, Russia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed in Mexico, Russia
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A meeting, photo and book exhibition and film show took place in Mexico and round-table talks in Russia on June 13 and 14 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and their works.
					
					 Korean film "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" was shown.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., WPK marks an event to be specially recorded in its history.
					
					 He said that the WPK won only victory in the struggle against the imperialist allied forces to safeguard socialism and defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation under his leadership.
					
					 The chairwoman of the Maritime Territorial branch of the All-Russia Women's Council "Hope of Russia" lauded Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the prominent leaders who performed immortal exploits in developing the WPK.
					
					 She said that the WPK has further developed into the model of the revolutionary parties in the world since Kim Jong Il started his work at its Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Ugandan, Nepalese Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Ugandan, Nepalese Figures
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Uganda and Nepal on June 17 and 18 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venues of the seminars were photos dealing with the exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in building and leading the WPK and Marshal Kim Jong Un's Songun revolutionary leadership exploits.
					
					 Also on display there were books and photos introducing the invincible might of the WPK.
					
					 The director of the Secretariat of the Uganda National Resistance Movement said that June 19, 1964 when HE Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK was the day of great significance in its development.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 It would be unthinkable without the exploits Comrade Kim Jong Il performed in building and leading the WPK that it has won victory after victory, rejecting all challenges of history.
					
					 His revolutionary exploits will shine forever as he provided the firm political and ideological foundation on which the WPK can form a harmonious whole with the popular masses and fulfill its mission and duty as the political staff leading the Korean people's cause of independence and socialism to victory.
					
					 The director of the International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist) and other speakers paid the noblest tribute to Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK, saying that today socialist Korea is dignified with independence, Songun and is demonstrating single-minded unity as there is June 19.

articles.title: Workshops on Kim Jong Il's Works Held in Spain
articles.content:
Workshops on Kim Jong Il's Works Held in Spain
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Madrid and Vasco groups for the Study of the Juche Idea in Spain on June 17 held workshops on leader Kim Jong Il's works on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 There took place a briefing on the gist of his works "Socialism Is the Lifeline of Our People" and "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party". Then followed speeches.
					
					 Members of the Vasco Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee was a significant occasion which brought about a drastic change in the struggle for strengthening the WPK and accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution and a historic event that instilled fresh confidence into the world progressives admiring socialist Korea.
					
					 They renewed their will to widely introduce the works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chief of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and other speakers noted that study of works of Kim Jong Il helped them know better about how the Korean people have been able to firmly protect socialism centered on the popular masses.

articles.title: German Body Supports DPRK's Stand
articles.content:
German Body Supports DPRK's Stand
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany released a statement on June 17 in support of the statement made public by a spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and its allies' daily increasing threat and blackmail against the peace-loving DPRK is a manifestation of their wrong foreign policy.
					
					 Far from accepting a series of peace proposals made by the DPRK, the U.S. has resorted to reckless moves for a war against it. This behavior of the U.S. is just hypocrisy and last-ditch effort of the one on death-bed that betrays its colors as a morally depraved country.
					
					 Progressive people of conscience will bring the U.S. and its lackeys to a court of history and mete out due punishment to them for their crimes.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers should be thrown to the dumping ground of history.
					
					 Only then, genuine justice and peace will settle on the earth.
					
					 It is also the unanimous demand of humankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Become Pillars Supporting a Prosperous Future Korea" was brought out in pamphlet by the Chita City Publishing House of the Zabaikal Territory, Russia on June 17.
					 Kim Jong Un made a congratulatory speech at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations on June 6, Juche 101 (2012) in celebration of the 66th founding anniversary of the KCU. In the speech he expressed his firm will to invariably carry forward the noble outlook of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the future and the rising generation.
					
					 He also indicated the tasks and ways to bring up the KCU members to be knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy reserve forces who are responsible for the future destiny of the country and the nation.

articles.title: DPRK Embassies Visited by Foreign Party Delegations and Personages
articles.content:
DPRK Embassies Visited by Foreign Party Delegations and Personages 
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Representatives of political parties and personages of various strata in different countries visited the DPRK embassies in their countries from June 7 to 17 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included delegations of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran, the Funcinpec Party of Cambodia and the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, the general secretaries of the Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party, the Central Committee of the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, the president of the Bangladesh People's League, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Democratic Revolutionary Party of Bangladesh, the chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, the chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea and other personages.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and painting depicting them standing together before paying tribute to them.
					
					 On June 15 and 18, the chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who doubles as chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea sent bouquets to the DPRK embassies in their countries.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Assail U.S. Anti-DPRK War Rehearsals
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Assail U.S. Anti-DPRK War Rehearsals
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on June 16 issued a joint statement denouncing the U.S. devil-may-care moves to invade the DPRK.
					 The statement accused the U.S. of working out a criminal nuclear war scenario called "precision air raid operation" targeting the DPRK and mulling mobilizing huge forces including B-2 nuclear strategic bombers for carrying out it.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 This proves that the U.S. remains unchanged in its strategy to stifle the DPRK by force as it is the most aggressive and dangerous of its nuclear war threats to the DPRK.
					
					 But the U.S. should bear in mind that the Korean People's Army led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the invincible and iron-willed commander, will react to the U.S. all-out war with a total war of its style and wipe out the invaders to the last one.
					
					 The U.S. criminal war moves once again prove the validity and necessity of a new line of simultaneously developing the two fronts set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Film shows took place in Russia, Indonesia and Uganda from June 14 to 18 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The participants watched the Korean film "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un".
					
					 The general chairman of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into a model of socialist ruling parties, an invincible party deftly mobilizing all people to the drive for carrying out the cause of the leader in firm unity around him.
					
					 The general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said the film showed that the DPRK is a politico-ideological power and military power with tremendous might, adding that the military parade and public procession of Pyongyangites held in celebration of the 70th anniversary of the WPK fully demonstrated the might of Juche Korea where the leader and the people are firmly united as one.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee was a historic event of great significance in developing the WPK. He added:
					
					 It is thanks to the wise guidance of the WPK that the Korean people are working epoch-making miracles in building a socialist power while meeting all challenges of the imperialists.
					
					 The experience gained by the WPK in leading the revolution and construction to victory by forming a harmonious whole with the popular masses is something very precious which the progressive political parties in Africa should learn from.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Russian Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Russian Media
 Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Russian media carried special write-ups interwoven with articles from June 15 to 17 to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK)
					 The newspaper Byvor dedicated one whole page to an article titled "Workers' Party of Korea and Kim Jong Il" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together and a picture of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il built the WPK into the mother party serving the people after forming a harmonious whole with them and developed it into a reliable and experienced political staff for carrying out the cause of the Songun revolution.
					
					 The high honor and dignity of the WPK leading the socialist cause to victory with confidence while enjoying absolute support and trust from   The newspapers Komsomolskaya Pravda and Kommersant carried articles praising the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by developing the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party, the mother party. 
					
					 Similar articles were posted on internet news Erofei-Deve, Khabarovsk territorial internet paper Zebri Deve, and internet homepage Irkutskblogspot. Ru. 
					
					 The media lauded Kim Jong Il for developing the Juche idea, the Songun idea founded by Kim Il Sung as an invariable guiding idea of the WPK and pushing ahead with the modeling of the whole party on Kimilsungism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-10"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-10"
Pyongyang, 23 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-10", cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance tierra-tierra.
					En el puesto de vigilancia, el Mariscal escucho un plan de lanzamiento de "Hwasong-10" y dio la orden de practicarlo.
					
					La prueba se realizo segun un sistema de lanzamiento de anglo alto simulando el maximo alcance de tiro.
					
					Mientras el Mariscal observa, el cohete partio de la plataforma automovil, subio hasta mil 413.6km, maxima altura, segun la prefijada orbita de vuelo y cayo exactamente en el area de aguas destinadas del objeto que esta a 400km del frente.
					
					Segun el resultado de prueba fueron confirmadas las caracteristicas aerodinamicas, la seguridad y el control de nuestro cohete balistico con sistema modernizado y las caracteristicas tecnicas de su estructura y sistema energetico disenados nuevamente, asi como las caracteristicas resistentes al calor y la seguridad de vuelo de la ojiva en el tramo de reentrada.
					
					A traves del presente lanzamiento fue preparada la firme garantia cientifica y tecnica para el desarrollo del sistema de las armas estrategicas.
					
					El presente lanzamiento se realizo con exito sin dar ninguna influencia a la seguridad de los paises circunvecinos.
					
					El Mariscal mostro una gran satisfaccion del resultado de la prueba y dijo con alegria que esta noticia contenta sobre la fulminante victoria deviene un gran acontecimiento que dio la conviccion y el optimismo en la victoria segura al ejercito y el pueblo y volvio a demostrar claramente el poderio invencible de la Corea Juche.
					
					Al ver solo la orbita del vuelo, tanto los enemigos como el mundo pueden evaluar correctamente la capacidad del cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance, senalo y agrego que tenemos la capacidad segura de atacar de manera total y practica a los yanquis dentro del teatro de operacion del Pacifico.
					
					A fin de garantizar con firmeza la seguridad de la patria y el pueblo desde la amenaza permanente de las fuerzas hostiles incluyendo Estados Unidos, es preciso poseer el poderoso medio de ataque capaz de amenazar siempre a los enemigos, subrayo y se refirio a la necesidad de ampliar y fortalecer de manera constante la capacidad de ataque nuclear preventiva y seguir investigando y desarrollando diversas armas de ataque estrategico.
					
					El enemigo verdadero de nuestras fuerzas armadas nucleares es la misma guerra nuclear, acoto y anadio que debemos formar incesantemente la capacidad de ataque nuclear para salvaguardar la patria, el pueblo y la revolucion desde la amenaza nuclear de los imperialistas norteamericanos.
					
					El presente lanzamiento de prueba sirvio de un importante motivo por fortalecer aun mas la capacidad de ataque nuclear de nuestro Estado, dijo y enfatizo la necesidad de establecer mas estrictamente la direccion unica y el sistema de administracion unica sobre las fuerzas armadas estrategicas.
					
					El Mariscal se fotografio junto con los cientificos de defensa nacional, participantes en el lanzamiento felicitando el exito del lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-10".

articles.title: Canciller coreano se reune con embajador brasileno
articles.content:
Canciller coreano se reune con embajador brasileno
Pyongyang, 23 de junio (ACNC) -- El canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Yong Ho, departio el dia 22 con Roberto Colin, embajador de la Republica Federativa de Brasil en la RPDC, quien le hizo una visita de despedida.
					En la ocasion fue evaluado positivamente el hecho de que durante el mandato del embajador brasileno las relaciones bilaterales vinieron desarrollandose favorablemente en los sectores de la economia, cultura, deporte, etc. y reafirmada la voluntad comun de seguir ampliando y desarrollando las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises. 
					
					El embajador brasileno expreso profundo agradecimiento al gobierno de la RPDC que durante su mandato le ofrecio activa cooperacion y agrego que vio con sus propios ojos la realidad de la RPDC al participar en varias actividades incluido el centenario de natalicio de Su Excelencia Kim Il Sung.
					
					Mostro su admiracion y  respeto al pueblo coreano diciendo que llego a conocer bien sobre el pueblo coreano que logra la prosperidad del pais superando las dificultades y pruebas y deseo que las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises sigan desarrollandose positivamente tambien en el futuro. 
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los funcionarios del MINREX de la RPDC y un miembro de la embajada brasilena.

articles.title: MINREX critica carteo instigado por EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX critica carteo instigado por EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 23 de junio (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que Estados Unidos instigo al secretario general de la ONU a remitir una carta que niega el derecho de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea al lanzamiento de satelite artificial, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 23 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					La RPDC registro oficialmente a la ONU el satelite de observacion de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4 pasando por los tramites legales en virtud del convenio sobre el registro de los objetos lanzados al cosmos.
					
					Este hecho significa que el mundo reconocio que Kwangmyongsong-4 es un patrimonio que contribuye a la prosperidad comun de la humanidad. 
					
					Sin embargo, el 15 de junio, el secretario general de la ONU envio una carta incoherente al presidente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					En la misiva el escribio que "fue registrado un objeto disparado por la RPDC al cosmos el 7 de febrero de 2016 e informado su resultado a los paises miembros de la ONU", segun el convenio arriba mencionado.
					
					Y continuo que "este registro no pasa de ser un tramite tecnico correspondiente al convenio" y "transmite al Consejo de Seguridad el entendimiento de que no atribuye ninguna legitimidad ni justeza al susodicho lanzamiento de la RPDC".
					
					Fue orquestada por EE.UU. la presente farsa contradictoria al cargo de secretario general de la ONU y carente de imparcialidad y autonomia de las actividades de la ONU.
					
					El objetivo principal de EE.UU. es fabricar la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU cuestionando el derecho a la autodefensa y los otros legitimos del Estado soberano, reconocidos por la ley internacional, y asfixiarlo a toda costa usando todos los medios y metodos ilegales y gangsteriles. 
					
					En estos dias, EE.UU. lleva al extremo la ya inestable situacion de la Peninsula Coreana volviendo a despachar sus medios estrategicos de todo tipo a la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno y recrudece por otra parte la campana de sancion y aplastamiento contra la RPDC.
					
					 La realidad vuelve a comprobar que justa es la linea optada por la RPDC de impulsar simultaneamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					 Estamos preparados tanto para el dialogo como para las medidas fisicas y disponemos de todo lo necesario para ello.
					
					  EE.UU. debe justipreciar la posicion estrategica de la RPDC y la corriente de la tendencia y tomar la decision de cancelar su anacronica politica hostil contra ella.
					
					  Mientras se mantenga la politica hostil norteamericana, la RPDC consolidara mas en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa y seguira ejerciendo, digan lo que digan otros, su legitimo derecho al desarrollo espacial con fines pacificos.

articles.title: CRPP condena intento de Park Geun-hye de escenificar segundo incidente de Kwangju
articles.content:
CRPP condena intento de Park Geun-hye de escenificar segundo incidente de Kwangju
Pyongyang, 23 de junio (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, la banda de Park Geun-hye es sometida a las fuertes protestas y condenas de distintos sectores de la sociedad surcoreana por haber tratado de realizar el llamado "desfile por las calles de la ciudad metropolitana de Kwangju en conmemoracion de la guerra del 25 de junio" movilizando la 11a brigada aerotransportada de operacion especial.
					En mayo de 1980 cuando se desato el Levantamiento Popular de Kwangju, esa brigada cometio una masacre salvaje contra los sublevados y ciudadanos segun el control trasero de EE.UU. y la orden asesina de la camarilla fascista militar de Chun Doo Hwan. 
					
					El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) divulgo el dia 23 la informacion no. 1106 que sigue:
					
					Tal hecho significa un insulto intolerable a los participantes en el Levantamiento Popular de Kwangju y a los ciudadanos de la misma urbe, un desafio frontal a los habitantes surcoreanos aspirantes a la independencia, democracia y reunificacion y otra provocacion politica contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El intento de celebrar el "desfile" de los asesinos, que habian convertido la ciudad de Kwangju en un "bano de sangre", demuestra que los compinches traidores de Park Geun-hye quieren salvar su precaria vida con fiebre fascista y enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					No se puede evitar el segundo incidente de Kwangju ni la caida de desastres sobre la nacion, si se deja intacta a Park que heredo los genes del dictador "Yusin" (renovacion) y no sabe nada de la situacion mundial.
					
					La poblacion surcoreana y todos los demas connacionales, aspirantes a la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion, deben llevar al fracaso mediante la lucha conjunta los actos imprudentes de la horda de Park que levanta la ola de fascismo para salir de agonia.
